24f5f782-19e1-4bc0-9c02-c3300753ad3b: A Hellknight's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are treated as {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
34864416-50f4-4eed-8c38-158cc38e6084: A rebel and a fighter for freedom and good, the Azata acts on instinct and trusts in spontaneous decisions. The Azata easily befriends those who don't fit into the neat ranks of the official crusade, and does not issue commands, but rather inspires allies to fight.
1daf5444-b4f2-4792-b37e-de40edae90cf: After consuming the angelic heart, you have become fearless and immortal. You gain immunity to death and fear effects.
1838bfcb-9cd3-4ab5-891f-0c415c20be80: All your {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} are increased by 4. Your level cap has become 40 (you still can only get 20 levels in one character class), and the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:XP}XP{/g} needed to level up is drastically decreased.
ffb62289-694d-470e-9619-85302aaa0ecb: Allows you to craft potions up to level 6 during {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}camping{/g}.
de190c12-a13c-4537-a070-dc8f4186a42e: An emissary of Hell vested with the power of law and evil, the Devil commands anything and everything imaginable through strength and sheer will.
122da963-7ed6-44a2-b8e5-6afa1ca5dd47:
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, Aeon can attempt to suppress the effects of mythic powers of his enemies. This ability affects only mythic demons, who can oppose the power with a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. Non-distorted mythic demons gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on this saving throw.
At 7th mythic rank, distorted mythic demons no longer get a saving throw to resist the effect, and non-distorted mythic demons don't get a bonus on the saving throw.
Starting at 9th mythic rank, mythic demons can't save against this ability.
Some mythic demons are immune to this ability.
b922f4b4-f491-4abe-87c9-982bd63f036c:
As long as you keep fighting, the power of your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} keeps growing.
Benefit: Every turn, as long as you make at least one melee {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, you gain a stacking +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with melee weapons, up to a maximum of +10, that lasts until the end of combat.
2bf8277b-896c-42f9-926d-aa5d18828030: At 10th mythic rank, Aeon automatically {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} 20 on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} rolls and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against chaotic creatures. Additionally, his {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistance{/g} and immunities of chaotic enemies.
3859a266-f449-4d43-994e-cbbbc4b5bbce: At 3rd mythic rank, Aeon starts changing his own body and mind to remove impurities contained within. He gains immunity to poison, disease and confusion, and gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against chaotic enemies equal to his mythic rank.
cbf1ef40-7fa0-48ce-ad00-ae88e0ac3531: At 5th mythic rank, Aeon gains immunity to bleed, mind-affecting effects and {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}.
50f8c327-a91e-4890-aa9f-5ece4f8c17c8: At 5th mythic rank, you gain immunity to poisons and electricity.
f7081123-50fa-44e8-9ea1-f50eabca2711: At 7th mythic rank, Aeon becomes immune to curse and {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} effects, as well as energy drain.
70520f70-7249-4a7f-8144-3c157c041fbf: At 7th mythic rank, Aeons power is great enough to protect his allies from impurities. All his allies in 30 ft radius gain immunity to poison, disease and confusion.
115cc700-dfe5-44d8-b4c6-46b4687ec2b8: At 8th mythic rank, Aeon always {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} twice, choosing the best result, on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, against chaotic enemies.
b0290cc6-ea92-4c60-9eae-870edab10e8b: At 9th mythic rank, all allies within a 30ft range of Aeon gain immunity to mind-affecting effects.
babbeb23-47cf-4f06-b409-de9f63649d10: Channeling negative energy causes a burst that {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damages{/g} all living creatures in a 30-foot radius centered on the character. The amount of damage dealt or {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} plus 1d6 per mythic rank. Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to halve the damage. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this save is equal to 10 + mythic rank + the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier (whichever is higher).
e08333c2-454b-44a2-a51c-52a4b8309e11: Channeling negative energy causes a burst that {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} all undead creatures in a 30-foot radius centered on the character. The amount of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt or healed is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} plus 1d6 per mythic rank.
d7bbb471-7c6f-43f0-b5f6-5ae640335612: Each time you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with your ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, or reduce the target to zero {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, you deal your weapon damage to all other enemies in 10ft radius.
cea2ad11-caa0-4c8b-b1a0-43039727291c: Every time you miss an enemy with a ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, your aim improves, giving you a stacking +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on attacks against the same enemy up to the maximum of your mythic rank. Every successful hit lessens this bonus by 1.
49610458-f366-4dcb-a885-b076a7cb79a5: For the Trickster, nothing is set in stone, because every stone can be smashed to pieces — if one is powerful enough. With every tweak and twist they make to the world, the Trickster shatters mundane understandings of reality, often simply for the fun of it.
da2777d4-0baf-4a1c-a907-db5bfd28bc33:
From now on, you are made of the Swarm. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} of a swarm and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. You {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} increase by (4 plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}). You gain immunity to most effects affecting a normal mortal body, such as poison, disease, paralysis and stun.
Additionally, while Swarm Form is active, all your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal additional (4 plus your swarm size) {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and any opponent that attacks you in melee combat is dealt (4 plus your swarm size) {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d6{/g} of damage.
19d3ea41-e547-497d-8d2e-5df4ccb81f7d:
If a character can catch an ally when they are unable to defend themselves effectively from her {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g}, she can heal a vital spot for extra healing.
The character's heal heals extra {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} anytime her target would be denied a {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} (whether the target actually has a Dexterity bonus or not), or when the character {g|Encyclopedia:Flanking}flanks{/g} her target. This extra healing is {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per die of your sneak {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. This additional healing is precision healing.
8d9f4539-ebc9-4095-884a-3142cef5c61d:
In a dire situation, you can instantly make your way to a companion in danger and get them back into combat.
Benefit: Three times per day, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} you can teleport to an ally who has less than 30 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}. Until the end of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, your first {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or ability is empowered and maximized, as though using the Empower Spell and Maximize Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}.
Empower Spell: All variable, numeric effects of an empowered spell are increased by half including {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Saving throws{/g} and opposed rolls are not affected, nor are spells without random variables.
Maximize Spell: All variable, numeric effects of a spell modified by this feat are maximized. Saving throws and opposed rolls are not affected, nor are spells without random variables.
ae7518ef-05e3-4756-9262-33e1ab0d5105: Mythic Skill Focus — Use Magic Device
cf952e64-2fda-40bc-aa8a-fbe347255244: Mythic Tricksters can find creative uses for their {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
373a0b70-214e-4f93-a012-7b566437296d:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Chaos gain an ability to create 3 illusionary copies of themselves. Those copies last for 1 minute per mythic rank and act like mirror image {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, protecting the character from {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. Those characters can use this ability 3 times per day.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters become more creative, gaining a +3 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
24a013d6-77be-4130-a658-28cc47af3d0c:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Freedom gain an ability to unleash a bolt of energy from Elysium itself, targeting an ally or a foe within 50 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This bolt deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} plus 2d6 per mythic rank) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to enemies. If used on allies, the bolt instead charges their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with weapons for 2 + mythic rank {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. Companion's attacks with weapons deal an additional 2d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} on hit and count as good for the purposes of bypassing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. Those characters can use this ability 3 times per day plus one extra time for each mythic rank beyond the first.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters become closer to the azatas that live in Elysium, gaining resist electricity 20 and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects.
9913a5c2-4e87-457b-9b78-9aec17fa7a00:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Good gain an ability to unleash a ray of heavenly light, targeting an ally or a foe within 50 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This ray {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} allies for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} plus 2d6 per mythic rank points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} or deals the same amount of damage to enemies. Those characters can use this ability 3 times per day plus one extra time for each mythic rank beyond the first.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters become closer to angels, gaining resist acid 20, resist cold 20, and an immunity to petrification.
962d8de9-8302-4808-a06c-6af3379100d1:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Law gain an ability to force reality upon the enemies around. Every enemy in 30 feet radius around the mythic character is affected by a greater dispel magic {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effect, affecting only the effects of the Illusion school.
The {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} for this ability is equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus your mythic rank.
11e4944f-d461-4876-b8d0-4a7a1e4c6c9c:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Law gain an ability to force reality upon the enemies around. Every enemy in 30ft radius around the mythic character is a target of greater dispel magic spell effect, affecting only abilities of Illusion school.
On the 2nd mythic rank, the mythic character gains the ability to fix hindering abnormalities in his allies. One ally in close range is target to greater dispel magic spell effect affecting all negative effects.
The {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} for these abilities is equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus mythic rank. You can use them 3 plus mythic rank times per day.
450b68d9-26c1-4482-a332-df8de25a2433:
Mythic characters that draw their power from the Abyss grow a pair of horns, gaining a gore {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. This attack is made with a -5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} plus 1-1/2 times their {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g}. It counts as cold iron and magic for the purposes of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters become closer to demons, gaining resist electricity 20 and an immunity to poisons.
782f7631-eac9-428a-943a-9f0f0909eda5:
Mythic characters that draw their power from {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} can channel negative energy to deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to living creatures or to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} undead creatures.
Channeling energy causes a burst that either heals all undead creatures or damages all living creatures in a 30-foot radius centered on the mythic character. The amount of damage dealt or healed is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} plus 1d6 per mythic rank. Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to halve the damage. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this save is equal to 10 + mythic rank + the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier (whichever is higher). Creatures healed by channel energy cannot exceed their maximum hit point total: all excess healing is lost. A character may channel energy a number of times per day equal to 3 + mythic rank. This is a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} that does not provoke an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters gain an even greater mastery of negative energy. Their insight into the flows of negative energy also gives them an advantage in combat against enemies that have an affinity to negative energy, such as the undead or the Nabasu demons.
These characters become immune to negative levels and gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on saving throws against death effects. They gain a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, saving throws, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and damage rolls against creatures with negative energy affinity. The DCs of their class abilities against these opponents increase by 2.
0b7fefa2-1c1e-48f6-8290-1c1976d480fa: On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from Chaos become more creative, gaining a +3 circumstance {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
75e6a932-ed15-44c7-9630-ad019e7fbcec: On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from Freedom become closer to the azatas that live in Elysium, gaining resist electricity 20 and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects.
284d41ac-5806-406d-abe8-f82b0ca76279: On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from Good become closer to angels, gaining resist acid 20, resist cold 20, and an immunity to petrification.
a93fbaea-0a5c-47ee-9670-457d011bb54d: On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from the Abyss become closer to demons, gaining resist electricity 20 and an immunity to poisons.
45d01924-1604-4a21-a4b5-10a2cbad245a:
On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} gain an even greater mastery of negative energy. Their insight into the flows of negative energy also gives them an advantage in combat against enemies that have an affinity to negative energy, such as Undead or Nabasu demons.
These characters become immune to negative levels and gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against death effects. They gain a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}, saving throws, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} against creatures with negative energy affinity. The DCs of their class abilities against these opponents increase by 2.
962e27e1-4b5b-4862-8709-667ecb76cfd9: On the 2nd mythic rank, the bodies of the mythic characters that draw their power from Law become less vulnerable. They gain resist cold 20 and when a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} or sneak {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} is scored on the them, there is a 25% chance that the critical hit or sneak attack is negated and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is instead {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolled{/g} normally.
d21244d2-f18a-470b-8b52-fd26d9103b5f: One doesn't need to be a mythic creature, an otherworldly being, or a deity's chosen to become a hero. This path may be grueling and full of temptation, but the mortal who treads it fully earns the right to call themselves a true Legend.
d82b5475-2168-4fd5-b1fc-082cf834c501: Select one {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from your {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} and mythic feats that apply to another school of magic, such as Spell Focus feat and School Mastery mythic feat, now apply to the chosen school of magic too.
8be79af8-6de6-4b14-968a-a56f3bcf9df6: Select one {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast that belong to this school have their {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} increased by 1.
805368ce-b972-4b3b-9166-6d33738f76dd:
Some people motivate their companions by their mere presence, while you learnt that pain is a much more potent motivator.
Benefit: Every time you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} an ally, they gain a +2 mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}, and a +1 mythic bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. The bonuses last for a number {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to half your mythic rank.
ba45ca23-930f-40c8-8ca6-80184c70b027: The Aeon is the embodiment of law and order and possesses the power to correct abnormalities in the fabric of time and reality itself. Nothing can escape the Aeon's scrutinizing gaze and impartial judgment.
5b47dffc-d55b-4079-9b2c-92ec89fbdb38: The Angel is a mighty champion of good who sets a shining example for the crusaders, smiting demons with a sword of holy flame. Those who fight alongside the Angel can be certain that they will be protected, {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g}, and even resurrected in the event of their untimely demise.
c1a55049-4a14-4a4b-b5fc-0967d46650a4: The Demon gains a tail slap {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}. If used as part of a full attack {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}, the tail slap attack is made at the Demon's full {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} –5. If the tail slap hits, it deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (assuming the Demon is Medium; 1d4 points of damage if Small) plus half the Demon's {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier.
bd5cd979-998c-4c14-9655-8cf0c7a85745: The Demon is the epitome of rage; a little push is all that is needed to break their self-control and turn them into a force to be feared — by enemies and friends alike. It is up to the Demon to decide whether to allow their inner beast to take control, or to fight it, chain it, and bring it to heel.
6a19d980-b1a8-48b5-b88d-671c0d3bf31b:
The Gold Dragon gains immunity to cold, fire, electricity and acid, energy drain and negative energy. All your {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is now {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}.
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} dealing damage now change their dice to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d10{/g}, if it was not d10 or greater. If it was d10 or greater, the spell instead plus one {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage per die.
Bonus to your highest ability score increases to +8.
11bff979-4976-4395-91f3-25d2f02f3624:
The Gold Dragon gains immunity to mind-affecting effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 15 plus your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} and half your mythic rank.
If your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} is less than 15 plus mythic rank, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} up to that number.
All {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} become class skills for you. If you have less ranks in a skill than your mythic rank, you gain a bonus up to that number.
If any of your attributes before modifiers is less than 18, you gain a bonus up to that number.
Bonus to your highest ability score increases to +6.
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} now change their dice to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d8{/g}, if it was not d8 or greater. If it was d8 or greater, the spell instead plus one bonus to damage per die.
54348153-bd1a-4135-ac55-284c0814b69c:
The Gold Dragon gains immunity to poison, disease, fear, confusion, paralysis and sleep. He also gains resistance to all energies equal to (his {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus half his mythic rank).
If any of your {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} before modifiers is less than (5 + your mythic rank), you gain a bonus up to that number.
If any of your attributes before modifiers is less than 14, you gain a bonus up to that number.
Your highest ability score gets a +4 bonus.
All your {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}hit dice{/g} are now {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d12{/g}.
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} now change their dice to d6, if it was not d6 or greater. If it already was d6 or greater, instead the spell deals one additional point of damage per dice rolled.
All your weapons count as +5 weapons.
6f58cf47-7062-43d7-b7ff-9c5d226383fa: The Gold Dragon is a mighty, almost omnipotent creature that possesses powers beyond all others. The Gold Dragon is the embodiment of goodness, hope, and redemption.
a809f3b0-2240-4c95-aac9-3aa83a6a4dd9: The Legend's powers are beyond the abyssal corruption's reach. The Legend and all companions can {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g} up to 5 times after the Legend had cleared all the corruption from themselves at a safe place.
7f440b63-3a07-41fb-afd3-65d9963094e7: The Swarm has only one desire — to devour everyone and everything in its path. There are no friends or foes, enemies or allies, dear ones or despised ones — only food.
efb066fc-8233-465b-bf48-f1238970f9bd:
The bigger they are, the easier they are to hit for your ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on your attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} with ranged weapons, equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} the target receives from their {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} (if any).
864953f3-bee6-4ec6-8991-18be137faf9f:
The creatures you summon gain a piece of your mythic power.
Benefit: Creatures summoned by you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} equal to half your mythic rank plus 1. Their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} now ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} except N/-.
3694e627-8937-4fb0-b63f-e21c8d0c0646: The loss of bodily strength is the high price you pay for becoming a lich.
95e4b7e0-1c58-48cf-9b0d-a88266c5f4a8:
The mythic character gains the ability to fix hindering abnormalities in their allies. One ally in close range is affected by the effect of the Greater Dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, affecting all negative effects.
The {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} for this ability is equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus mythic rank.
91f361cc-c94c-464d-83ba-6d6d5b9c12fd:
The path to becoming a legend is a long and difficult one, but after you become one — you will be the pinnacle of what a mortal can become.
All your {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} will be increased by 4. Your level cap will become 40 (you still can only get 20 levels in one character class), and the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:XP}XP{/g} needed to level up will be drastically decreased.
2e6031a6-bf53-423b-b026-f76ff39874d7:
The sound of your blows is powerful enough to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} even without {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} through enemy defenses.
Benefit: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, when your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} misses the target, you deal ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} plus 1d6 per two mythic ranks) {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} to all enemies in 10-feet radius.
cd21308e-269a-4da3-8a17-99b987c8e9ef: The ultimate ruler of undeath, the Lich is a being who has transcended the narrow confines of life itself. Powerful beyond imagining, the Lich can create limitless hordes of undead to remake the world to fit their vision.
9b2d0759-711c-4812-9206-0279ed72d87a:
The wounds you inflict with your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} are anything but natural.
Benefit: Your natural {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} now ignore all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} except N/-.
ba3f586e-1862-444c-a191-1904b0426adc:
The {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} you deal with your chosen weapon is truly awesome to behold.
Benefit: When using your chosen weapon, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}. This stacks with the bonus from Weapon Specialization and Greater Weapon Specialization.
1c451159-9bb3-47d2-a3f5-d188f3ae955f:
When focused, you become nearly impossible to strike.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} from Dodge increases by 1. You gain +10 dodge bonus to AC against first attack every round.
5c8485eb-9c3c-4af0-9534-627d9262adda:
When your shots hit the target, they do truly devastating {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
Benefit: When you use Deadly Aim, you gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on ranged damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} instead of +2. When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4, and every +4 thereafter, the bonus on ranged damage rolls increases by +3 rather than +2.
d9588daf-6ca6-4a4b-a812-563f9a98327c: Whenever you miss with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, the target still takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. This damage cannot be increased by any other means.
007286c2-014c-42c5-aaa6-12d861fbd67d:
Whether you channel energy to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} or kill, it's especially potent.
Benefit: When you channel energy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} you heal or deal increases by a number of points equal to twice your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
cb2dfb82-1313-4eeb-8a10-29bbb1d21985:
With greater potency and frequency, your fists stun those who stand against you.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of your Stunning Fist increases by half your mythic rank.
f730f5e3-4cc3-4200-98ea-8eab043d91d2:
With weapons in both hands, your deft strikes make you twice as deadly.
Benefit: Your {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} for fighting with two weapons are reduced by 2.
4ba33488-98c8-470a-8b24-78260d264e79: Xanthir Vang's magic has made the Aeon's Mythic Suppression ability stronger. Whenever the aeon uses it, the target additionally gets a -2 penalty to AC and a -5 penalty to spell resistance. From the 7th mythic rank on, these penalties increase to -4 to AC and -10 to spell resistance.
709d136b-4748-4cd4-9811-87ce760dec5e:
You are a beacon of hope for your comrades, and they perform better near you.
Benefit: Your allies within 50 feet of you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank plus 1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects, and their {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g}.
f7fdc50c-1b3f-4797-9301-e12ef5afa9f3:
You are a master of the hideous laughter {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
Benefit: When a creature fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against your hideous laughter spell, another random enemy within 30 feet of the target is affected by the same spell. This chain continues as long as targets continue to fail their saving throws.
aef2a5c5-1e21-44ae-87f2-a3175400b464:
You are a master of the mage armor {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
Benefit: Whenever you cast mage armor on yourself, it gives an additional armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your mythic rank.
8bfdd8dc-2325-4f03-8200-d336e052b223:
You are a paragon of your sorcerous bloodline.
Benefit: You immediately gain an ability from the 20th level of your bloodline.
fba2f251-cddc-4321-9a10-ef6fac6df295:
You are able to channel your mythic powers into invigorating and coordinating your allies.
Benefit: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can enter a state of Battle Meditation. While in this state, you are unable to move, lose your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and count as being staggered. All allies in a 30-foot radius gain a morale bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects equal to one plus one per three mythic ranks.
5da32491-1f62-49be-ae73-8c51b6a36830:
You are always ready to unleash some extra {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
Benefit: Whenever you make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on the attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage roll{/g} equal to your mythic rank. The number of attacks of opportunity you can make each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} is increased by two.
03cc2a03-7a8d-48e7-ba6d-6b3f23a159c4:
You become The Swarm.
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} are increased by 4 plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 25 plus your swarm size, and you gain immunity to most harmful conditions.
You are also immune to exhaustion and fatigue effects. Your swarm form grants you a +10 profane bonus on Stealth skills checks for Camouflage role and a +10 profane bonus on Perception skill checks for Night Watch during rest and movement on global map.
8a1cc826-e201-4e1d-a6d0-a45062592016:
You become a Host of the Great Swarm, which now lives inside your body. This symbiosis gives you Fast {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Healing{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} depending on the {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} of the swarm.
To increase the size of the swarm you need to devour other living beings.
d4ae75b6-802a-4f9e-bcc1-cbdcd6e88c5a:
You can cast the first {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} after an {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} if that spell is either of a 1st level or is at least two levels lower than the maximum level of spells you can cast.
Sorcerous Reflex does not work with the 0 level spells (cantrips and orisons).
6e75953a-81cb-460a-9c5e-1f30e944a289:
You can create a surge of mythic powers that frees you from all magical restraints.
Benefit: Three times per day you automatically dispel any effects that make you Frightened, Dazed, Sickened, Shaken, Staggered, Nauseated, Stunned, Paralyzed or Confused whenever you become affected by any of those effects.
6b60966f-a26e-463a-bb07-bddddb48af7b: You can drink a potion as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
96b755e4-0573-42f6-af19-e3655df9fdf3:
You can fire many times each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} with amazing precision.
Benefit: When using Rapid Shot you ignore the {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}'s –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
1ab833c0-a6fc-42d2-ba55-84d79701da0c: You can make any undead creature fight on your side as if it was your ally. It will {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability. However intelligent creatures will try to throw off the domination, making a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
0a81b6c8-ff9e-4ba9-b3dd-5000a8b552d9:
You can make your patron give you additional powers.
Benefit: This ability lets you select any Witch Hex, and grants you the ability to use the selected Hex. You lose the ability to use the Hex after choosing another Hex with this ability.
db1fbb2d-e684-43a1-a9d3-8a79a5b23761:
You can now use your mythic powers to fuel your metamagic abilities.
Benefit: Select one kind of metamagic. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} level cost for its use decreases by one (to a minimum of 0).
cba144ff-8a01-4783-828b-0cb91c6431b5:
You can quickly deter others with your martial mastery.
Benefit: While wielding the weapon with which you have Weapon Focus, you can use Dazzling Display as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} with a –5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on your {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} to intimidate, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} with a –10 penalty, or as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} with a –20 penalty.
f07f2c0a-2fee-49b3-bdd9-5bf8526f3de5: You can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, ignoring its prerequisites.
642dc374-14ba-429f-9931-455f48d8c887:
You can strike your foes with incredible force.
Benefit: Whenever you use Vital Strike, Improved Vital Strike, or Greater Vital Strike to multiply the number of dice you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, you also multiply your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}, weapon's enhancement bonus and other bonuses that would normally be multiplied on a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} by the same number.
Extra damage from sources that wouldn't normally be multiplied on a critical hit isn't multiplied by this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
34ec1491-fc82-4cb7-abc6-29dca9f356be:
You can use your mythic powers to change your kinetic blasts ever further.
Benefit: You can simultaneously apply two substance infusions to your kinetic blasts.
7ac516df-be1b-4a82-884e-7b291a4ac5f9:
You feel a closer connection to your deity you serve.
Benefit: You gain one more domain, ignoring all domain prerequisites. This ability can only be taken by a cleric, inquisitor, or a hunter with the divine hunter archetype.
bf8b254b-f1e7-4d3b-85e1-262cb782f3b8: You gain a bonus feat. You can take this mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} any number of times.
535251a7-722e-41e2-b3f9-7f0d7eb3efe0: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} mythic ability. You can take this mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} multiple times.
c3f4d4e2-d7a7-4288-980d-6bcbf3d799e3:
You gain the ability to breath holy energy, {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacking{/g} all enemies in a 50-foot cone, dealing ({g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus half mythic rank){g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier) halves the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
Any enemy hit by the breath attack also gains a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all d20 rolls, while all enemies who failed the Reflex saving throw gain -2 penalty.
You can use your breath attack once every 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
8a383650-ff54-4348-8849-4982345d86bd: You gain the ability to use dominate monster as a {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like ability{/g} at will. Additionally, you gain fire resistance 20 and a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against poison.
59508b7d-8a4b-4567-ba6e-01f07487ec18: You gain the ability to use hellfire ray and power word stun as {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g} at will. Additionally, you gain immunity to fire, cold and acid resistance 10, and all your weapons count as being Lawful and Evil.
e130ec21-48a1-4c6a-b4b6-c5d981ea942a: You gain the ability to use overwhelming presence and power word kill as {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g} at will.
449563ff-ef7b-48c0-8217-b9effc08147c: You get a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. You also get additional {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, their number equal to your mythic rank.
f1eedc3a-d618-4e3b-a046-eef7b8f5f764: You have a divine connection with death, thus you can grant your undead followers divine power by making them worship you.
3090ab92-856f-4caa-88ac-ba859d8a25d8:
You have found out that curses can be a blessing, and now you know how to use them.
Benefit: You gain an additional Oracle Curse, but it gives you no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}.
f4aa86d7-eca9-4488-ae5a-3e9670782ffd:
You have mastered the art of applying elixirs at a distance.
Benefit: You can now apply your elixirs from a distance of 30 feet.
52f6025e-54cb-4293-b1fe-64a22c87cb11:
You have mythical resilience and durability.
Benefit: Toughness provides you twice as many {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}. In addition, when you're below 0 hit points, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/epic.
7fd40f28-5828-447a-9a73-b0ef88c2490a:
You have studied a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast four more spells per day of 4th, 5th, and 6th levels each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
2b9b7f6e-536b-450f-9c06-585e9f23a7ef:
You leap into the fray with speed and confidence.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} granted by Improved Initiative increases by an amount equal to your mythic rank.
e5e38c9a-8f40-46b0-bcf7-740449adf166:
You learned to use any shapes to the utmost.
Benefit: Whenever you become the target of a polymorph effect, all the physical {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} adjustments are modified by +4. Additionally, if you have the Wild Shape ability, you can use it any number of times per day.
5cd751e9-39ac-46fe-a0f7-7a3be9249b6e:
You learned to utilize the real power of the Shadows.
Benefit: Your Shadow {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} are 20% more real.
46f763cc-be68-4f03-baa6-a07dfc8caf9f:
You leave a mystical link with enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasters{/g} that lets you instantly move to them.
Benefit: Every time you are targeted by an enemy spell, you gain the ability to teleport to the spellcaster as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} for the next two {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
00551701-3a8c-4779-87f1-d87c3ba94748:
You mastered a certain element to a spectacular level.
Benefit: Choose one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, sonic, or negative). The {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of that energy type you deal can no longer be prevented or reduced by energy resistances or energy immunities. This bonus works on any damage you deal with the chosen energy type.
8c70ca32-0c34-4207-a711-fe9ca475d17a:
You mastery with this {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} is unmatched, even in difficult situations.
Benefit: You can always take 10 on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} with your choice of skill for Skill Focus if 10 on a {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} is enough for a successful skill check.
b7f23739-85ef-4c78-9f27-a088b4faed8e:
You moved closer to your deity and to the power it has over its divine domains.
Benefit: You can use the abilities of your domains as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
98fe84c1-63a8-4433-8615-102648bb8723: You no longer suffer your racial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}. Only races with a penalty to an ability score can take this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
41291f8f-d882-4ecb-80c5-9c9fed4d71fb: You only suffer a -4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on your iterative {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, instead of -5 penalty.
5c1df85b-0d09-427c-abba-156525ae7b74:
You opened your mind and soul to learn the secrets of a second mystery.
Benefit: You gain a second Oracle Mystery.
557d84bd-58a2-406e-8ff2-426553ff1385:
You push foes around with amazing ease.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to bull rush, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent bull rushes you. These bonuses stack with those granted by non-mythic Greater Bull Rush.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to bull rush you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
39772499-b1dc-41b3-b68a-dd9f9d5ced45:
You return all of the swarm into your body. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/- plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to natural armor equal to (4 plus your swarm size).
Using this ability cancels Swarm Infest and Swarm Feast.
e81841c6-7313-457d-ad30-23de03c10096:
You send a part of your swarm to devour a corpse to increase the {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} of your swarm.
The increase depends on the CR of the devoured corpse. When the amount of eaten enemies hits a threshold, you gain permanently increased {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from other Swarm That Walks abilities.
4a547fdf-00d5-495f-9c47-8a3ed7acd53f:
You send a part of your swarm to infest an enemy. It makes the target blind and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}8d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Physical_Damage}physical damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases by 2d8 for each point of your swarm size. If the target dies while under this effect, it's automatically devoured.
When the ability ends (by activating Swarm Form ability), you are {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for the amount of damage you've dealt to the enemy with Swarm Infest.
Additionally, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 15 + double your mythic rank) or become panicked.
Using this ability cancels Swarm Form and Swarm Feast.
ec3bdfb8-5330-44b0-9a53-63112ac54bb2: You suffer a -2 penalty to your Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution ability scores. Your movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is reduced by 10 feet. Your attacks have a 20% miss chance.
0deb16e6-f101-4944-8b2c-e01e6934b1ba: You summon a soothing light, warming the hearts of your allies and obscuring the vision of your enemies. Every ally in 20ft radius gets 1 temporary hit point for 1 hour, and the enemies become dazzled for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
2414ed79-7e83-4207-a3f0-d1ce55243755:
You use your mythic powers to fuel kineticist abilities.
Benefit: Gather power ability now reduces the burn cost of the kineticist blasts by one additional burn point.
d37efdce-9e60-4bb2-964f-491808d5aa7e:
You use your mythic powers to power your judgments.
Benefit: You can now use judgments any number of times per day.
6df46593-39e5-488e-8b02-d3d15181d9c3:
You're a master of down-and-dirty fighting.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to attempt a dirty trick, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent attempts to perform a dirty trick on you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Greater Dirty Trick.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts a dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g} against you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
38232375-7fc6-40d6-b354-0e0bb7472de3:
You're a master of using your shield for protection.
Benefit: Add your shield {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and your shield's enhancement bonus to your {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
b5bc6a9f-1c14-48c4-a221-0157939b7960:
You're a mythical master of one type of weapon.
Benefit: Double the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} on your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} from Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus.
acb43d0b-fd92-4a76-9a88-1937b4cdf997:
You're an expert with weapons that rely on your agility.
Benefit: When using Weapon Finesse, you may also use your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier on your {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.
2645e152-48eb-4e86-9f1d-a66eb61ab2cc:
You're expert at knocking your enemies' weapons away.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to disarm, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent tries to disarm you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Greater Disarm.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to disarm you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
1bc61e1a-71e9-4991-ba7c-826525f877b6:
You're expert at knocking your foes down.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to trip, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent tries to trip you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Improved Trip.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to trip you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
49f4ac41-2b13-4557-8382-b0497e83954d:
You've found a way to infuse your blood with even more power.
Benefit: You select a second bloodline, getting all its benefits.
aa8ef06f-9d1b-4cc3-aa39-658d974dc78f:
You've found a way to use your {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}perception{/g} and knowledge to better defend yourself.
Benefit: Your Studied Target ability gives you a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against the target of your Studied Target ability equal to the bonus this ability gives you to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
40f24b83-77b2-45f3-a647-21723bb21bcb:
You've learned a way to fill your arcane reservoir to the maximum.
Benefit: You no longer gain only 3 + 1/2 arcanist level arcane points in the arcane reservoir after a {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g}. Instead, you gain 3 + arcanist level points.
0af91986-2670-4af3-9019-914ac343a3ed:
You've learned a way to increase the number of uses of your Smite Chaos ability.
Benefit: You can use Smite Chaos a number of additional times per day equal to half your mythic rank.
2418fe51-209f-4511-8731-fc2fb22364d9:
You've learned a way to increase the number of uses of your Smite Evil ability.
Benefit: You can use Smite Evil a number of additional times per day equal to half your mythic rank.
7b1356c9-1380-4c28-b799-3fdab0bb608d:
You've learned a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day you can use your Bane ability.
Benefit: The number of rounds per day you can use your Bane ability increases by a number of rounds equal to your mythic rank.
eacc8ae0-20f5-46d8-a0b7-3167cfcac3df:
You've learned a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast four more spells per day of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd ranks each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
ed9c0a5a-e045-4b39-b294-d6b8b684a5aa:
You've learned a way to increase your Arcane Pool.
Benefit: Your Arcane Pool increases by a number of points equal to your mythic rank.
12773003-f4bc-49b3-9606-6461accc2f4e:
You've learned a way to increase your ki pool.
Benefit: Your ki pool increases by a number of points equal to your mythic rank.
40a86c19-4459-437c-891f-cd638468fa86:
You've learned a way to prolong the effects of your beneficial {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
Benefit: Effects of your spells on your allies that should last longer than an hour but shorter than 24 hours now last 24 hours.
36fea083-0c35-4f4f-8aac-c10fe93c2a95:
You've mastered a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast four more spells per day of 7th, 8th, and 9th ranks each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
25344a83-4809-4706-b649-5c3e9f023bac:
You've mastered a way to prolong your beneficial {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
Benefit: Effects of your spells on your allies that should last longer than 5 minutes but shorter than 24 hours now last 24 hours.
33037ebf-55ec-4a31-adb6-2b88b86eeb83:
You've mastered the art of raining elemental {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} on your foes, and found a way to empower them by combining different elements.
Benefit: Every time a spell you cast deals {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} to a creature, you apply an elemental mark to it. If during the next three {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} you deal energy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to a marked target with a different type of energy, the target is dealt additional Divine damage. The damage is {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per mythic rank of your character.
c7f84344-a4d8-4327-9388-c3b31e21c28c:
Your accuracy with {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} is unmatched at point-blank range.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} granted by Point-Blank Shot increases to +2.
434e2bde-229e-411b-b49a-0ad843019480:
Your animal companion is just as mythic as you.
Benefit: Your animal companion gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} equal to half your mythic rank plus 1. Its {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} now ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} except N/- and count as ghost touch weapons.
60c08be0-b678-452d-8f5e-fe3580e28b09:
Your charge carries the weight of your mythic powers.
Benefit: Your charge {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal additional Divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per mythic rank.
aa17a300-061b-4989-a893-db81c0023483:
Your defensive capabilities in combat are unmatched.
Benefit: Add half your mythic rank to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}.
c112e32d-c820-4fea-b592-ec15ef2eec85:
Your fortitude is unmatched.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}, roll twice and take the higher result.
9b0eb562-e7a6-42e2-ae57-546743634da2:
Your growing powers let you speak to one more spirit.
Benefit: You gain one more Shaman Spirit.
751aeb59-3d66-4844-9969-ad36d4a7c869:
Your inner fortitude is so strong that it lets you overcome most debilitating conditions.
Benefit: At any time you would become paralyzed, you become staggered instead. If you would become nauseated, you become sickened, and you become shaken instead of frightened.
0e69ac55-a195-488c-ba0a-7b1491aecb09:
Your magical specialties are particularly effective.
Benefit: Choose a {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g} you already have Spell Focus in. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} DCs provided by Spell Focus and Greater Spell Focus for that school increases by 1.
a95b74dc-8e04-48ce-9dfe-d8ea89512ebe:
Your mighty smashing blows demolish armor.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to sunder, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent tries to sunder an object used by you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Greater Sunder Armor.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to sunder an armor used by you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
d80716a5-441f-45bd-b327-a8b81e84afd1:
Your mission is too important to fall in battle and your mythic powers let you endure unbelievable things.
Benefit: Once per day, when your {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} drops low, you become unkillable. For two {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, you become immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} that would make you {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}.
3d25a712-d66e-4f45-a7ad-102827175a9d:
Your mythic magical power breaches your enemies' defenses.
Benefit: Add half your mythic rank to {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}. If you have Greater {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spell{/g} Penetration, add your full mythic rank instead.
0b99dd3c-b478-4db7-a99b-a64f2dadac83:
Your mythic powers can negate any magic around you.
Benefit: Activating this ability grants you magic immunity and dispels any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effects on you.
a59e0ffb-3d4a-4468-a327-5e7c2e6c14f2:
Your performances are unforgettable.
Benefit: Your bardic performance ability now works as if you were a bard of 6 levels higher.
a2baae63-59bd-4ffa-b7eb-7c659ad29860:
Your rage knows neither limits nor bounds.
Benefit: You no longer have a limited amount of Rage {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day.
a8fb3700-b497-48b8-bc16-424fb1f7cf86:
Your ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are dangerous enough for the enemy to forget about melee threats.
Benefit: If you hit an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged weapon attack{/g}, they receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} equal to half your mythic rank for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
5f1b8357-9452-46de-aa1d-d16617114af3:
Your ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} expose the enemy's vulnerable points.
Benefit: Every third hit with a ranged weapon against the same enemy deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per two mythic ranks divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
9ef18aaf-419d-47f2-8bf1-969a12db1d52:
Your reflexes are superhuman.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g}, roll twice and take the higher result.
ae67277c-0b51-4817-b30f-558edec2723c:
Your strikes make cracks in the enemy existence, leaving weak points for your allies to strike.
Benefit: Every time you hit a target in melee combat, you leave a mark on it. Any ally {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacking{/g} the marked target deals additional Divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per your mythic rank to the target, consuming the mark.
Note: Only one ally can leave a mark on a target at a time. Others allies with Leading Strike ability do not deal additional damage to a marked target.
c3da0e20-059c-476c-8384-720d8692b3d7:
Your swarm flies out of your body and starts {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacking{/g} all enemies in a 50-foot radius. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} all enemies in the area are dealt (4 plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Physical_Damage}physical damage{/g}. If they die while in the area, they are automatically devoured.
Any ranged or ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} against you have a 50% chance to miss.
Using this ability cancels Swarm Form and Swarm Infest.
f227d789-f3a6-44a5-a6a8-5f044a13b927:
Your will is incorruptible.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}, roll twice and take the higher result.
a3433569-d4d7-484b-9b9d-3681c16a1495:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are now less affected by luck.
Benefit: You don't automatically miss when you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a 1 on an attack roll.
1c4bd4a6-e87a-4528-8fa0-e0eb0a3dd0ca:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are truly devastating.
Benefit: When you use Power Attack, you gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} instead of +2. When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4 and every 4 points thereafter, the amount of bonus damage increases by +3 instead of +2.
This bonus to damage is increased to +5 if you are making an attack with a {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} weapon, a one-handed weapon using two hands, or a primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapon{/g} that adds 1.5 times your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier on damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
c2ead968-9515-4a6c-8c53-3199d9087909:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are truly vicious.
Benefit: When you use Piranha Strike, you gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} instead of +2. When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4, and every +4 thereafter, the bonus on damage {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} increases by +3 rather than +2.
0d428b26-5986-4ce0-bf38-b67a6a3d81b6:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} strikes with your chosen weapon are deadlier than most.
Benefit: Your critical multiplier with your chosen weapon is increased by 1.
1a040938-9183-4f3a-97ca-b2aa073c57b3:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} is no longer affected by common limitations.
Benefit: Whenever you cast a cure wounds {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or another healing spell, it becomes reach as though using the Reach Spell {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Also, the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} it now restores depends entirely on your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and disregards any limits in the original spell.
Reach Spell: You can alter a spell with a range of {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g}, close, or medium to increase its range by one range category, using the following order: touch, close, medium, and long.
aab3ebd4-9c62-41b6-afa3-9892a846460b:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} with your favored weapon can frighten enemies.
Benefit: While wielding the weapon in which you have Weapon Focus, you can perform a bewildering show of prowess as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. Make a {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to demoralize all foes within 30 feet who can see your display.
3cc514da-620e-412f-857c-b27a87d4a08e:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes are more powerful than others.
Benefit: You can add half your mythic rank to your {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with unarmed strikes.
